## Gapminder dataset
```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
class(gapminder)
str(gapminder)
```

```{r}
ncol(gapminder)
```

```{r}
nrow(gapminder)
```

```{r}
dim(gapminder)
```

```{r}
summary(gapminder)
```

```{r}
typeof(gapminder)
```
```{r}
summary(gapminder$continent)
```
```{r}
range(gapminder$lifeExp)
```
```{r}
y <- gapminder$lifeExp
hist(y)
```
```{r}
summary(y)
```
```{r}
x <- gapminder$year
plot(x, y)
```
```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x=year, y=lifeExp)) +
    geom_point()
```
```{r}
gapminder %>%
    filter(country=="Canada") %>% 
    arrange(year) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(pop, gdpPercap, color=year)) +
    geom_point()
```
